data: See BCCH Transplant Therapeutic Drug Monitoring Guidelines
Assess patient's baseline creatinine and eGFR
Titrate TACrolimus to the specified patient target and schedule repeat testing, as per BCCH Transplant Therapeutic Drug Monitoring Guidelines
For TACrolimus level: 1) more than 1 ng/mL above or below target, or 2) out-of-range on two consecutive tests, or 3) if risk factors for altered drug metabolism
Titrate TACrolimus long acting to the specified patient target and schedule repeat testing, as per BCCH Transplant Therapeutic Drug Monitoring Guidelines
For TACrolimus level: 1) more than 1 ng/mL above or below target, or 2) out-of-range on two consecutive tests, or 3) if risk factors for altered drug metabolism
Titrate SIrolimus to the specified patient target and schedule repeat testing, as per BCCH Transplant Therapeutic Drug Monitoring Guidelines
For SIrolimus level: 1) more than 1 ng/mL above or below target, or 2) out-of-range on two consecutive tests, or 3) if risk factors for altered drug metabolism
